name: The Price of Recovery
description:
A (parody?) fangame for Gatobob's The Price of Flesh.

Be warned that The Price of Flesh is an +18 horror survival VN with porn elements. The Price of Recovery is clean, but follows one of the endings on Derek's path, so it is recommended to complete that path first.

The "parody?" comes in due to the change of atmosphere from horror-filled situation to just getting a meal at a dinner with a friend you made during that life-death situation.

Tom has been thinking of you ever since you saved him in the desert. During dinner, it's up to you to decide if you want to share those feelings or inspire him to share his. Things aren't without your trauma, though.

Includes:

  • 5,700 words
  • 6 endings (2 being unlockable once the others are complete)
  • Tom being cute.
  • A nameable protag with special text changing out here and there if a certain name is used (check the about page for a hint and some doodles to explain).
